comment._content: Background on this photo is available at: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9401E6DC133CE633A...

comment.author: 48889036733@N01
comment._content: Elbert Martin was a stenographer to former President Roosevelt who wrestled with the would-be assassin John Schrank. There is a Gutenberg project e-book on the attempt here: www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/21261
